main event: A UFO sighting was reported with details concerning its shape, color, and flight characteristics.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape and bright orange in color., The object was observed for approximately 14 minutes., It was estimated to travel at 222 knots. The observed speed allowed for high maneuverability., The pilot confirmed that the object was not a balloon., The object changed color from orange to green during the sighting.
location: Kirkland Air Force Base, New Mexico, USA
